com.neovisionaries.jdo

Class Dao<TEntity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neovisionaries.jdo.Dao<TEntity>
  • Type Parameters:
    TEntity - 

    public class Dao<TEntity>
extends Object
    DAO based on JDO. 
     // Persistence manager factory.
 PersistenceManagerFactory factory = ...;

 // Create a DAO with an entity class and the persistence manager factory.
 Dao<Customer> dao = new Dao<Customer>(Customer.class, factory);

 // Or using a static method.
 Dao<Customer> dao = Dao.create(Customer.class, factory);

 // Use the DAO.
 Customer customer = dao.getById(customerId);
    Since:
    1.2
    Author:
    Takahiko Kawasaki

      • create

        public static <TEntity> Dao<TEntity> create(Class<TEntity> entityClass)
        Create a DAO for the specified entity.

        This method just does the following: 

         return new Dao<TEntity>(entityClass);
        Parameters:
        entityClass - Entity class.
        Returns:
        A new DAO.

      • create

        public static <TEntity> Dao<TEntity> create(Class<TEntity> entityClass,
                            javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory factory)
        Create a DAO for the specified entity.

        This method just does the following: 

         return new Dao<TEntity>(entityClass, factory);
        Parameters:
        entityClass - Entity class.
        factory - A persistence manager factory.
        Returns:
        A new DAO.

      • delete

        public void delete(TEntity entity)
            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                   IllegalStateException,
                   javax.jdo.JDOUserException
        Delete an entity. A persistence manager factory must be set before this method is called.
        Parameters:
        entity - An entity to be deleted.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - entity is null.
        IllegalStateException - A persistence manager factory is not set. Or, failed to create a persistence manager from the persistence manager factory that this instance holds (= PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager() failed).
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - PersistenceManager.deletePersistent(entity) failed.

      • delete

        public void delete(javax.jdo.PersistenceManagerFactory factory,
          TEntity entity)
            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                   IllegalStateException,
                   javax.jdo.JDOUserException
        Delete an entity.
        Parameters:
        factory - A persistence manager factory.
        entity - An entity to be deleted.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - factory is null, or entity is null.
        IllegalStateException - factory.getPersistenceManager() failed.
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - PersistenceManager.deletePersistent(entity) failed.
        Since:
        1.6

      • deleteById

        public void deleteById(Object id)
                throws IllegalArgumentException,
                       IllegalStateException,
                       javax.jdo.JDOUserException
        Delete an entity. If there is no entity having the ID, no change is made. A persistence manager factory must be set before this method is called.
        Parameters:
        id - Entity ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - id is null.
        IllegalStateException - A persistence manager factory is not set. Or, failed to create a persistence manager from the persistence manager factory that this instance holds (= PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager() failed). Or, PersistenceManager.getObjectById(entityClass, id) threw an exception other than JDOObjectNotFoundException.
        javax.jdo.JDOUserException - PersistenceManager.deletePersistent(entity) failed.

      • getUnique

        public TEntity getUnique(String field,
                Object value)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException,
                         IllegalStateException
        Get an entity using a condition that identifies the unique entity. A persistence manager factory must be set before this method is called.
        Parameters:
        field - A database column name which has UNIQUE constraint.
        value - A value of the data field which identifies the unique entity.
        Returns:
        A unique entity, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - field is null or value is null.
        IllegalStateException - A persistence manager factory is not set. Or, failed to create a persistence manager from the persistence manager factory that this instance holds (= PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager() failed).
        Since:
        1.5

      • getUnique

                String field,
                Object value)
                  throws IllegalArgumentException,
                         IllegalStateException
        Get an entity using a condition that identifies the unique entity.
        Parameters:
        factory - A persistence manager factory.
        field - A database column name which has UNIQUE constraint.
        value - A value of the data field which identifies the unique entity.
        Returns:
        A unique entity, or null if not found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - factory is null, field is null, or value is null.
        IllegalStateException - factory.getPersistenceManager() failed.
        Since:

        public List<TEntity> getList(String field,

                      throws IllegalArgumentException,
                             IllegalStateException
        Get entities using a condition that filters them. A persistence manager factory must be set before this method is called.
        Parameters:
        field - A database column name.
        value - A value of the data field which filters entities.
        Returns:
        Entity list.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - field is null or value is null.
        IllegalStateException - A persistence manager factory is not set. Or, failed to create a persistence manager from the persistence manager factory that this instance holds (= PersistenceManagerFactory.getPersistenceManager() failed).
        Since:
        1.7
